name: MetalEtemon
description: MetalEtemon is a humanoid chimpanzee with armor made out of Chrome Digizoid . It wears a pair of black sunglasses and has a WaruMonzaemon toy attached to the right side of its waist. Its left wrist has three belts and screws in its ears, right shoulder, and knuckles. It has gold teeth and wears a gold medallion. The characters on its chest read "Strongest" ( 最強 , Saikyou ? ) .
